title: Unable to access League Alpha Client
body: I just got a new windows computer and I installed League, but every time I try and install the League Alpha client, the login doesn't open up, but instead I get a message telling me that LoL has encountered a problem and that I need to try re-installing the Alpha client again. I've done this several times, but it still doesn't work. Any ideas on how to fix this problem, or should I just try sticking to the old client?

replies.body: You may need to restart your computer in case the client crashed in the background and isn't closing.  If the issue persists then a security setting may be blocking it from opening.  If that's the case then the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help!  Let me know if you have any questions!
